about_the_game:
Clockwork Owl is a Coin Pusher Roguelite. Use turn-based classic arcade coin-pushing physics mechanics as a means to battle forest critters, while making your way up a tree. Collect a deck of new cogs from random encounters and upgrade your owl at shops to survive this permadeath journey.

Experience the nostalgic bliss of an arcade coin tower game with a twist (and a hoot ^-^).

STORY

Time is under attack! And Owls are the sworn protectors of Time itself. The forest critters have laid siege against the timeteller's clocktowers, in hopes to cease time from flowing and halt human advancement. But the owls know that time must continue, as change is the proper way of nature. You must gather up your cogs and travel through time itself to protect the timeteller's clocktowers of new and old.

THE SHOP

Build your deck of cogs wisely, they are the only defense against the hoards of encroaching forest critters.
